HEADING: Qualifying for jury service
HEADING_OB: Does the person you're answering for qualify for jury service?
MAIN: Your answers in this section might mean you cannot do jury service. But even if you think you cannot, we still need you to fill in the rest of the online form. We need the rest of the information you give us so we can be sure whether you can do jury service or not.
MAIN_OB: Your answers in this section might mean the person cannot do jury service. But even if you think they cannot, we still need you to fill in the rest of the online form. We need the rest of the information you give us so we can be sure whether the person can do jury service or not.
CAPTION: Qualifying for jury service
RESIDENCY_TITLE: Have you lived in the UK, Channel Islands or Isle of Man for 5 consecutive years since your 13th birthday?
RESIDENCY_TITLE_OB: Has the person you're answering for lived in the UK, Channel Islands or Isle of Man for 5 consecutive years since their 13th birthday?
RESIDENCY_MORE_INFO_LINK: Find out how where you have lived can affect whether you can do jury service

MENTAL_HEALTH_SECTIONED_MORE_INFO_LINK: Find out how the Mental Health Act 1983 can affect whether you can do jury service

BAIL_TITLE_OB: Is the person on bail for a criminal offence?

QUESTION_4: This only applies if you were given a prison sentence, community order or suspended prison sentence.
